data.comment: The match is underway in Groningen.
At Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium, Wessel Dammers has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
Jorgen Strand Larsen (Groningen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Groningen's Ahmed El Messaoudi has been booked in Groningen.
Danny Buijs is making the team's first substitution at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium with Alessio Da Cruz replacing Patrick Joosten.
Bart van Hintum for Groningen has been booked by Jeroen Manschot and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, The away team replace Moussa Sylla with Eljero Elia.
Arjen Robben is replacing Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist for the home team.
Azor Matusiwa (Groningen) has received a yellow card from Jeroen Manschot.
In the minute 88, Gabriel Gudmundsson is replacing Daniel van Kaam for Groningen at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
